content: चातुर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [चतुर एव स्वार्थे अण्] {@--1@} Relating to four. {@--2@} Clever, able, shrewd. {@--3@} Speaking well, flattering. {@--4@} Drawn by four (as a carriage). {@--5@} Governing, ruling. {@--6@} Visible, perceptible. --रः A small round pillow. --रं A four-wheeled carriage. --री Skill, dexterity, ability; तद्भटचातुरीतुरी <ls>N. 1. 12.</ls>
